title: Embroidered Picture, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in tent, knot, and couching stitches and looping (needle-made lace) on plain weave foundation
description: Picture illustrating the story of Pyramus and Thisbe.  Wide floral borders with an animal in each corner and a bird in the middle of each side.  Several areas raised.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk and metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in tent, knot, and couching stitches and looping (needle-made lace) on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-117.
